Package samples.MouseMenu

Interface Summary
EdgeMenuListener<E> An interface for menu items that are interested in knowning the currently selected edge and its visualization component context.
MenuPointListener Used to set the point at which the mouse was clicked for those menu items interested in this information.
VertexMenuListener<V> Used to indicate that this class wishes to be told of a selected vertex along with its visualization component context.
 

Class Summary
DeleteEdgeMenuItem<E> A class to implement the deletion of an edge from within a PopupVertexEdgeMenuMousePlugin.
DeleteVertexMenuItem<V> A class to implement the deletion of a vertex from within a PopupVertexEdgeMenuMousePlugin.
EdgePropertyDialog  
EditorMouseMenu Illustrates the use of custom edge and vertex classes in a graph editing application.
GraphElements  
GraphElements.MyEdge  
GraphElements.MyEdgeFactory  
GraphElements.MyVertex  
GraphElements.MyVertexFactory  
MyMouseMenus A collection of classes used to assemble popup mouse menus for the custom edges and vertices developed in this example.
MyMouseMenus.CapacityDisplay  
MyMouseMenus.EdgeMenu  
MyMouseMenus.EdgePropItem  
MyMouseMenus.pscCheckBox  
MyMouseMenus.tdmCheckBox  
MyMouseMenus.VertexMenu  
MyMouseMenus.WeightDisplay  
PopupVertexEdgeMenuMousePlugin<V,E> A GraphMousePlugin that brings up distinct popup menus when an edge or vertex is appropriately clicked in a graph.
PopupVertexLida
